name: bootstrap4sosci
description: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web. Adapted to SoSci Survey.
author: The Bootstrap Authors (https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/graphs/contributors) and Mario Haim (https://haim.it)

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
